column7: Bilateral aid delivered through a Multilateral

column13: Aid from other UK Official Sources5

column1: 1.    Descriptions of aid types given in Technical Note 1.
2.    Other Bilateral Aid covers bilateral aid not elsewhere classified
3.    Details on DFID Imputed Multilateral Shares are in Section 2; 2012/13 data are not yet available.

4.    Developing Countries are those countries and regions in the DAC List of Recipients of Official Development Assistance. Since the 2008 edition of SID, Turks and Caicos,Barbados and Trinidad & Tobago and Saudi Arabia have been removed from the DAC list.

5.    Pension payments have been reclassified from "Other Financial Aid" to "Aid from other UK Official Sources".  This is consistent with the classification of spending under Department Expenditure Limits (DEL) agreed with Treasury.
